sQuestion: During a school play , Jonah staffed the snack bar . He served 0.25 pitcher of lemonade during the first intermission , 0.4166666666666667 pitcher during the second , and 0.25 pitcher during the third . How many pitchers of lemonade did Jonah pour in all ?

Then she walked 0.3333333333333333 mile to the carnival rides and 0.08333333333333333 mile from the carnival rides back to the car . How many miles did Heather walk in all ?
